Likely file naming: camelCase for identifiers, kebab-case or folder-per-feature for packages/files

glossary.definition: Top-level folder containing runnable applications (webapp, website).
Workspace packages that are imported by apps or other packages (ui, convex, configs).
A backend-as-a-service platform used here for server-side logic and realtime DB functions.
Task runner / build orchestration used to speed up monorepo builds.
Monorepo package manager configuration used to link internal packages.
